```{r, load-libs, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
library(dplyr) 
library(tidyr)
library(gt)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(readr)
```

```{r, load-table, echo=F, message=F}
# Load table
os_table <- read_csv(here("data", "os_data.csv"))
```


```{r, add-entry, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# Add new entries
new_entry <- tibble(
  Authors = "Kentner and Franz", 
  Year = 2019, 
  Title = "No evidence for prosodic effects on the syntactic encoding of 
           complement clauses in German", 
  Journal = "Glossa", 
  `Data available` = 1, 
  `Code available` = 1, 
  Notes = "Example of publishing null findings.", 
  Link = "https://www.glossa-journal.org/article/10.5334/gjgl.565/"
) %>% 
  bind_rows(os_table, .) %>% 
  write_csv(., here("data", "os_data.csv"))
```


```{r, create-table, echo=F}
# Create GT table
os_table %>% 
  gt()
```
